c74object.name: seq.makecc~

attribute.name: range
attribute.digest: Specifies whether the signal into the first inlet are on the range of 0 to 1 or 0 to 127.

attribute.name: controller
attribute.digest: MIDI controller number to transmit messages on.

attribute.name: autointerval
attribute.digest: When auto is enabled, sets the minimum amount of time in milliseconds between sampling events.

attribute.name: auto
attribute.digest: When enabled, value changes to the first inlet can be sampled and output automatically.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.digest: Channel to transmit MIDI messages on.

c74object.description: seq.makecc samples audio signals between 0. and 1. and outputs MIDI CC messages. The object can be configured to sample automatically when the note value changes, or sampling can be triggered with an impulse to the second inlet.
c74object.digest: Convert signals to MIDI control change
